scripts.test:report: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' mocha test/index.test.ts --timeout 180000 --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=nexus-core-full-report,inlineAssets=true,charts=true && node scripts/generate-report.js
scripts.test:report:json: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' mocha test/index.test.ts --timeout 180000 --exit --reporter json > reports/test-results.json && echo 'JSON report generated at reports/test-results.json'
scripts.test:report:simple: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' mocha test/index.test.ts --timeout 180000 --exit --reporter spec > reports/test-output.txt && echo 'Simple report generated at reports/test-output.txt'
scripts.test:report:all: npm run test:report:json && npm run test:report && echo 'All reports generated in reports/ directory'
